show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
The continuing dangers of Fukushima and what to do if a radiation fall out Why healthy babies should not be... <!--more--> overprotected from germs Probiotics can prevent diarrhea associated with taking antibiotics Brief training can improve resident physicians’ empathy with patients Facebook addiction Alternative medicine can help kick the smoking habit Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: When wanting to donate for the next natural disaster, please keep these facts in mind.
LOL re.
old age Callers: Allen from Brooklyn asked about the use of coconut oil in Parkinson’s disease Matt from New Jersey asked about which supplements might work for cancer.
He was referred to DoctorSaputo.com Pam from New Jersey called about how to manage chronic allergic joint problems and migraine headaches Sandy from Florida wanted to know how long to use probiotics after antibiotics and which ones are the best
